app.name: ReturnHelper
app.subtitle: Easy Package Returns
app.shortDescription: Schedule hassle-free package pickups for your online returns
app.fullDescription:
ReturnHelper makes returning online purchases effortless. No more trips to the post office or drop-off locations ‚Äì we pick up your returns right from your doorstep.

üì¶ EASY RETURNS
‚Ä¢ Scan return QR codes from any major retailer

üöó DOORSTEP PICKUP

üì± REAL-TIME TRACKING

üè™ WORKS WITH ALL MAJOR RETAILERS

üí≥ SIMPLE SUBSCRIPTION PLANS

Say goodbye to return anxiety. Download ReturnHelper today and make returns as easy as the original purchase!

Questions? Contact us at support@returnhelper.app
